entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to plus 1 this morning then steady. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm.
